form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the percentage depletion allowance for certain hardrock mines.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Elimination of Double Subsidies for the Hardrock Mining Industry Act of 2015.

section.header: Repeal of percentage depletion allowance for certain hardrock mines

subsection.text: Section 613(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by inserting (other than hardrock mines located on lands subject to the general mining laws or on land patented under the general mining laws) after In the case of the mines.
Section 613 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following:
For purposes of subsection (a), the term general mining laws means those Acts which generally comprise chapters 2, 12A, and 16, and sections 161 and 162 of title 30 of the United States Code.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2015.
